metadata.name: Guest User Invited By Non Approved Inviters
metadata.comment: Detects when a user that doesn't have permissions to invite a guest user attempts to invite one.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM account_change WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(message) = lower('invite external user') AND lower(status_code) = lower('failure'))

output.summary: Detects when a user that doesn't have permissions to invite a guest user attempts to invite one.

metadata.objective: False positive: A non malicious user is unaware of the proper process Reference: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/entra/architecture/security-operations-privileged-accounts#things-to-monitor
